title.narrative: Increasing Financial Inclusion in West Nile, Uganda

description.narrative: Refugees and host communities in West Nile, Uganda

The objective of this intervention is to boost household incomes by injecting capital based on Savings Group shareout. This will be achieved through a unique wholesale credit model within savings groups in West Nile region.

Vision Fund Uganda (VFU) is offering a credit model for Village Savings and Loans Associations (VSLAs) in the West Nile region. VFU targets to access stable NGO-supported groups and leverage the repayment and share-out data from previous cycles to determine eligibility for additional loan capital. The loans to VSLA members will allow them to invest in income generating activities (including agriculture and trade) to boost household incomes in refugee and host communities in the region.
